Privacy Policy
Modern Montessori Pre-School is committed to safeguarding and preserving the privacy of our visitors. All information gathered on this site is confidential. We will not sell, rent or loan this information to any other individual or business outside the Modern Montessori International (MMI) Group for any purposes. The information we gather is used for the purposes of this site, and to better serve your interests relating to our services and products. This site may contain links to other web sites. Please be aware that Modern Montessori Pre-School is not responsible for the privacy practices of other sites.
Please contact us if you have any questions about this statement.
LET’S WORK TOGETHER
We appreciate your interest in Modern Montessori International (MMI) Group. Having the Best People is an important piece of our Company’s Vision and Core Values.If you are interested in learning more about opportunities that may be available, please contact us at 6220 8200 or email your resume to enquiry@modern-montessori.com
